anual_compansation = df['What is your CURRENT annual base compensation in USD (not including bonuses, perks, or other incentives)? Please consult Google for conversion tools for local currency into USD. Enter number values only.']

source.2def46de: Out of 4200 survey participants, 3923 currently working in a consulting firms and 276 aren't.
source.e54b9a96:
Above chart tells us a few things:
- Consulting humor audience is mostly USA based.
- Most of the consultancy work is in USA, Means: More thinking, more economic impact, more experts needed to give directions and set the path.
- Data is biased towards USA.
